rules_text:
[i](As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.)[/i]
When Liberation of Omega enters the battlefield, return target creature from your graveyard to the battlefield.
rules_text2:
Deathtouch
When Mwamba dies, surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
